tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.NetworkError
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when there is an error reading from or writing to the network.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.NotImplemented
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when the requested method, channel, etc is not available on this connection.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.InvalidArgument
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when one of the provided arguments is invalid.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.NotAvailable
tp:error.tp:docstring: Raised when the requested functionality is temporarily unavailable.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.PermissionDenied
tp:error.tp:docstring: The user is not permitted to perform the requested operation.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.Disconnected
tp:error.tp:docstring: The connection is not currently connected and cannot be used.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.InvalidHandle
tp:error.tp:docstring: The contact name specified is unknown on this channel or connection.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.Channel.Banned
tp:error.tp:docstring: You are banned from the channel.
